original_text: Do you only love people who love you? God will not give you good things just for doing that. Even the men who take taxes love their friends!
korean_text: 너희가 너희를 사랑하는 자를 사랑하면 무슨 상이 있으리요 세리도 이같이 아니하느냐

sentences.original_text: Do you only love people who love you?
God will not give you good things
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 당신에게 좋은 것들을 주시지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Even the men who take taxes
